targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes"), 1s)  *8 FROM "autogen"."iface:traffic" WHERE ("ifid" = '0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT last("bytes") FROM "autogen"."iface:traffic" WHERE ("ifid" = '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
